title: Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2023 (S.I. 595 of 2023), with
heading: 2. The Disability (Assessment of Needs, Service Statements and Redress)
text_raw:
2. The Disability (Assessment of Needs, Service Statements and Redress)
Regulations 2007 (S.I. No. 263 of 2007) are amended by the substitution of the 
following Regulation for Regulation 24: 

“24. (1) A complaint shall be made to the Executive as soon as 
reasonably may be after the cause of the complaint arises and in any case, 
subject to paragraph (2), within a period of 3 months from that cause 
arising. 

(2) A person may apply in writing to the Executive for an extension
of the 3 month period of time within which a complaint may be made as 
referred to in paragraph (1) and shall state the reason the extension is 
sought. 

(3)

The Executive shall grant an application referred to in paragraph
(2) and extend the period of time within which a complaint may be made
where it is satisfied that the person making the application has shown
reasonable cause why such an extension should be granted.

(4)

The Executive shall, within 5 working days of making a
decision on an application referred to in paragraph (2), notify the person 
who made the application of the decision, the reasons for that decision 
and, where the decision is to extend the period of time within which a 
complaint may be made, specify the extended period of time within 
which the complaint concerned may be made.”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th December, 2023. 

 [601] 3

The Minister for Public Expenditure, NDP Delivery and Reform consents to 
the making of the foregoing Regulations.
